title: 21 - Quit Dabbling with Sin
description:
Stick with me. This conversation matters. Let's talk about our inputs and what we might be loving more than God and why it's crucial we pay attention.

Register for the FREE webinar with Jennie, David Platt, and Pastor X in the underground church here: https://www.rightnowmedia.org/webinar/jennie-interview

Pine Cove is a Christ-centered life-changing investment in your child’s future through a week of outdoor adventure and fun with a purpose! Check out pinecove.com! Use the code: JENNIE250 for $250 off a first-time overnight, youth camp registration.
